tooltip_twillio_account_sid: Twilio is a SMS Gateway.If you want system to send SMS then you must sign up with twillio and get your SID.
tooltip_twilio_auth_token: Twilio Auth Token is used to authenticate your Twillio App.
tooltip_twilio_number: Twilio provides a number from which your SMS will be sent.
tooltip_default_payment_gateway: Stripe is the default payment gateway. Stripe process payment from customer and deliver it to admin.
tooltip_stripe_secret_key: Secret and publishable keys are used to identify your Stripe account. You can grab the test and live API keys for your account under Your Account >> API Keys. The publishable key is used to generate credit card tokens and should be included with the HTML form.
tooltip_stripe_publishable_key: Secret and publishable keys are used to identify your Stripe account. You can grab the test and live API keys for your account under Your Account >> API Keys. The publishable key is used to generate credit card tokens and should be included with the HTML form.
tooltip_email_display_name: From name in the email sent by server. Example Eber Server
tooltip_email_domain_email_address: From email address of your domain which will be used to send email. Example: noreply@elluminatiinc.com
tooltip_android_user_app_gcm_key: GCM Key is used for push notification in User App.
tooltip_android_provider_app_gcm_key: GCM Key is used for push notification in Provider App.
tooltip_user_google_places_api_key: Google places API is required to draw path in user App get nearby places in Fare Estimate and auto complete suggestion for source and destination address.
tooltip_provider_google_places_api_key: Google places API is required to draw path in provider app.
tooltip_web_google_places_api_key: Google places API is required in dispatcher panel for auto complete suggestions of places.It is also used in Map view of Admin Panel for Auto complete results of places.
tooltip_hotline_app_id: ID for Customer Support system Hotline.io goes here.
tooltip_hotline_app_key: Key for Customer Support system Hotline.io goes here.
tooltip_ios_driver_app_url: iOS Driver App URL goes here. It is used in the landing page.
tooltip_ios_client_app_url: iOS Client App URL goes here. It is used in the landing page.
tooltip_android_driver_app_url: Android Driver App URL goes here. It is used in the landing page.
tooltip_android_client_app_url: Android Client App URL goes here. It is used in the landing page.
tooltip_admin_phone_number: This phone number will be used for contacting admin.
tooltip_admin_email_address: This email will be used for contacting admin.
tooltip_contact_email: This email will be used as contact email in the Apps.
tooltip_provider_timeout_in_seconds: Number of seconds system should wait for provider to respond for the incoming request.
tooltip_default_search_radius: Default search radius to look for providers
tooltip_scheduled_request_pre_start_minu: Minutes before scheduled request time when system should start searching provider for that request.
tooltip_number_of_loop_for_scheduled_req: Number of times system should retry if no providers are found in scheduled requests.
tooltip_currency_name: You can write the name of currency for this country. Example Rupee for INR Dollar for USD etc.
tooltip_referral_bonus_amount_to_friend: Please enter the amount of Referral bonus credit User's friend should get. Credit Currency will be default country currency.
tooltip_referral_bonus_amount_to_self: Please enter the amount of Referral bonus credit User should get if his Referral code is used. Credit Currency will be default country currency.
tooltip_user_referral_max_use: This number indicates maximum usage of user's referral code. If entered 2 then user's code will be used only 2 times by different friends.
tooltip_city_zip_code: Zip Code or Postal Code of the city.
tooltip_title_provider_min_wallet_amount: Provider Minimum Wallet Amount For Cash.
tooltip_city_code: Enter the code for the city. Eg. RAJ for Rajkot city.
tooltip_city_latitude: Latitude coordinate of the city's centre.
tooltip_city_radius: This is the integer value of service area for this city. Eg. 20 Km or miles depending on country's distance unit.
tooltip_max_space: Maximum number of people this service type can accommodate.
tooltip_surge_time_end: Select the time when you want to end the surge pricing.
tooltip_surge_multiplier: Enter the multiplier for surge pricing. Eg 1.5 which will raise the price by 1.5 times the original price.
tooltip_cancellation_fee: This is the fees charged on cancellation of the trip.
tooltip_price_for_waiting_time: Enter the flat charge for waiting time.
tooltip_base_price: Base price for this service type. Eg. $5 is the base price for SUV.
tooltip_surge_time_start: Select the time when you want to start the surge pricing.
tooltip_is_surge_hours: You can make surge pricing On or Off from here.
tooltip_tax: Percentage of tax on the total invoice.
tooltip_waiting_time_start_after_minute: Enter the Integer value for free waiting time. Eg. if entered 5 then waiting time charges will be calculated after 5 minutes.
tooltip_price_per_unit_distance: Price per km or mile for this service type.
tooltip_distance_for_base_price: Select the value for free distance covered in base price. Eg. if selected 2 then distance price will not be charged till 2 km or miles.
tooltip_provider_profit: Percentage of profit provider or driver should get for this service type.
tooltip_user_miscellaneous_fee: Percentage of user miscellaneous fee on the total invoice.
tooltip_user_tax: Percentage of user tax on the total invoice.
tooltip_provider_miscellaneous_fee: Percentage of povider miscellaneous fee on the total invoice.
tooltip_provider_tax: Percentage of user tax on the total invoice.
